creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
markings: censor seals: 村田 {Murata}, 米良 {Mera}, シタ賣 {shitauri}; publisher's seal: ト、通三遠彦 {To, Tōri San Enhiko}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
signed: in toshidama cartouche: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga}
text: Related to the play Kakitsubata tamuke no Hanakawado 杜若手向花川戸, performed at the Kawarazaki Theater, 1850, 3rd month.
title: Actors Iwai Kumesaburō III as Shirai Gonpachi and Arashi Kangorō I as the footsoldier (ashigaru) Kangohei
